name: Real Virtuality 1
description:
This is a GAME. A new, absolutely incredible game that uses your real movements with a mix of your real skills and real knowledges to control your in-game character in virtual game world, which is actually also real.
To play this game, you'll have to leave your soft chair at your sweet apartment and get outside. It uses GPS and your mobile phone's sensors to control your game character. So prepare to be tire, walk, run, drive, think, sing, dance and compare your results with other players at the end.
